sources.title: Junior Prom
sources.description: Junior Prom Freddie Stewart, June Pressier, Noel Neill 1946 Monogram Pictures This is the first of eight films in The Teen Agers series.

metadata.Plot: A rich man's son is running for student body president in the local high school, and the boy's father tells the school principal that if his son wins the election, he'll make a sizable donation to the school that will pay for the football team's much-needed uniforms.
metadata.Actors: Freddie Stewart, June Preisser, Judy Clark
